DocLocalization.Name: Platte / Scheibe
DocLocalization.Documentation: flächenförmiges statisches Bauteil mit Beanspruchung quer oder längs zur Fläche

DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Type of member with respect to its load carrying behavior in this analysis idealization.

DocAttribute.Name: Thickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the typically understood thickness of the structural surface member, measured normal to its reference surface.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
